content.value: Samvera's Annual Report for 2023 is now available
The financial statements are formatted as received from our fiscal sponsor, OASIS Open.

The statements show a small loss, reflecting our investment last year in hosting an in-person Samvera Connect and in paid development work to complete the integration of Valkyrie into Hyrax. Samvera still maintains a healthy reserve fund, and the Community remains fiscally sound. Each new Samvera Partner increases our ability to try new approaches and to meet collective needs. Thank you to all our Partners and contributors for your tireless efforts in 2023 and beyond!

openGraphData.og:description: Samvera™ is a vibrant and welcoming community of information and technology professionals who share challenges, build expertise, and create sustainable, best-in-class solutions, making the world’s digital collections accessible now and into the future. Samvera’s suite of repository software tools offers flexible and rich user interfaces tailored to distinct content types on top of a robust back end – giving adopters the best of both worlds.
